<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Mock ipinfo.io API/Get JSON by IP</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    response.setBody({
        "ip": "8.8.8.8",
        "hostname": "dns.google",
        "anycast": true,
        "city": "Mountain View",
        "region": "California",
        "country": "US",
        "loc": "37.4056,-122.0775",
        "org": "AS15169 Google LLC",
        "postal": "94043",
        "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles",
        "readme": "https://ipinfo.io/missingauth"
    });

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_1137665_iplookup/mock_ipinfo_io_api/{ipaddress}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/{ipaddress}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-17 20:27:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>7f656ea347c33150f73d0d45d36d43d3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Mock ipinfo.io API/Get JSON by IP</sys_name><sys_package display_value="IPLookup" source="x_1137665_iplookup">ba6fd1ec478ef110f73d0d45d36d431a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="IPLookup">ba6fd1ec478ef110f73d0d45d36d431a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_7f656ea347c33150f73d0d45d36d43d3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-17 21:58:18</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Mock ipinfo.io API">61445da347cffd10f73d0d45d36d43cf</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
